overview: Winter break has arrived, and Stéphane Moussu presents ten young guys in a house doing what cums naturally. In the bedroom, in the Jacuzzi, in the ski chalet and even on the way to the bedroom… with hormones raging the only thing on their minds is busting a nut. From morning wood to afternoons in the club house, it's all sex all the time!
tagline: A week of winter sports with friends…
title: House Of Bareback
